name: SpaceVania
description:
SpaceVania

Candidate to Metroidvania Month 5 Jam

Controls:

Cursors for direction (sorry for WASD users)

Z or W: alt direction

X: fire

C: change weapon

Automatic save when you die

Mission:

You must find new weapons to open new doors and access the boss arena....yes boring at hell xD

I choose low quality graphics, my main goal is to learn new things about the game engine i use, Phaser3.  So don't expect too much from this game.

Bugs: sometime the dashboard won't display, just refresh the page.

Credits:

Music: Trippy Vomit by ClockMaker

https://soundcloud.com/clockmaker1
